GradingAssist - Class in <Unnamed>
This program is meant for University graders using the Moodle website to intake assignment solutions which have grader-generated feedback files, unlike overwriting submission files.
GradingAssist() - Constructor for class GradingAssist
 

I

initializeMatches(boolean[]) - Static method in class GradingAssist
initializes the list of unmatched feedback files - this is speed

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class GradingAssist
calls two subsequent methods that accomplish different tasks: task A: generate empty folders from the submissions directory task B: filling the generated folders with the correctly matched feedback files

makeDestinationParentFolder(String, String) - Static method in class GradingAssist
creates the empty directory parallel to the submissions folder that will contain the generated empty feedback folders
moveFile(String, String, String, String) - Static method in class GradingAssist
moves a feedback file into its corresponding feedback folder once they have been matched

V

validateFolderPath(String) - Static method in class GradingAssist
validates the folder path you entered for you :D - folder path is invalid if it contains any of the following characters: < > : " / | ? *
